mapper.select: select m.menu_perm from pss_user_role_info ur LEFT JOIN pss_role_perm_info rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN pss_menu_info m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pss_user_info( user_id, user_name, user_pass, user_real_name, mbl_phone_no, fix_tphone_no, email, user_status, crte_date, upd_date )VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPass}, #{userRealName}, #{mblPhoneNo}, #{fixTphoneNo}, #{email}, #{userStatus}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
mapper.update: UPDATE pss_user_info SET ( user_name = #{userName}, user_pass = #{user_pass}, user_real_name = #{userRealName}, mbl_phone_no = #{mblPhoneNo}, fix_tphone_no = #{fixTphoneNo}, email = #{email}, user_status = #{userStatus}, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() ) WHERE user_id = #{userId}
